resources.string: Welcome to our Indian recipe app. Let\'s explore the\n vibrant world of Indian cuisine together
Cook with confidence using our step-by-step\n instructions and helpful tips for perfect results\n every time
From classic curries to modern\n dishes, we\'ve got you covered with our extensive\n collection of Indian recipes.

To begin making the Masala Karela Recipe 
 1- de-seed the karela and slice.Do not remove the skin as the skin has all the nutrients.
 2- Add the karela to the pressure cooker with 3 tablespoon of water; 
 3- salt and turmeric powder and pressure cook for three whistles.
 To begin making the Masala Karela Recipe

 2- Add the karela to the pressure cooker with 3 tablespoon of water; 
 3- salt and turmeric powder and pressure cook for three whistles.
